scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && pnpm run build:gas-lib && pnpm run build:gas-types && pnpm run build:npm-lib && pnpm run build:npm-types
scripts.deploy:npm-types:beta: pnpm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && cd dist/npm-types && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.deploy:npm-lib:beta: pnpm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && cd dist/npm-lib && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.deploy:npm:beta: pnpm run deploy:npm-types:beta && pnpm run deploy:npm-lib:beta
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm run deploy:gas:dev && pnpm run deploy:npm:beta
